Well, trevor and I went on his jet ski yesterday and it was a blast. It was so wavy and windy, it was crazy... we'd whip around hitting whitecaps everywhere. Only problem was that we got a little bit of water mixed in with the gas... so it died in the middle of the lake. Luckily, we were able to drift into madi's dock and her brother was able to tow us back. fun times
I got back from Colorado this morning. The Cavaliers won the drum corps championship... it was very cool. they did a 007 rendition or whatever you'd call it. it was sweet

It's getting late into the night or should i say early in the morning? My favorite bands at the time are the Red Hot Chili Peppers and Yellowcard. The only problem that i have with them both, is that if one of their songs isn't good... it really really sucks.

I'm having a great week in Colorado. First we went to Colorado Springs and did fun stuff there, then went to an old mining town called Leadville (it's the town of highest elevation in the U.S.). Today we went to the first rounds of the Drum and Bugle Corps Championships. for those of you who don't know what that is, it's the kind of stuff they did in Drumline. i get back sunday, see ya then.
